name: AdventRush
summary:
Experience real bullet-curtain STG arcade game on Android!

*REAL Bullet-curtain STG Game. Dodge within curtain of bullets. Challenge even the best game players.
*Power ups, firing mode changing, full game stages for a real arcade game experience.
*Full voices, Full sound effects and great stage music.
info:
• 中文名: 基督降临
  • 平台: Android
  • 游戏类型: STG
  • 开发者: AblazeDream
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 售价: ~US$2.09
  • 官方网站: http://www.ablazedream.com/
